channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14928] Analyze table no scan mess up schema
item.description: StatsNoJobTask uses static variables partUpdates and table to track stats changes. If multiple analyze no scan tasks run at the same time, then table/partition schema could mess up.
item.summary: Analyze table no scan mess up schema

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: cc: sershe, prasanth_j, Wondering if there were any reasons that we made them static at first place. Thanks.
